docs.title: Alpha Factory
docs.text:
Welcome! This site hosts Alpha Factory documentation.

  • CLI: See the registry and export commands under the CLI page.
  • Status: v0.2.9 docs; infra build toward v1.0 under way.

docs.title: Alpha Registry CLI
docs.text: Generated from alpha_factory.registry_cli help output.

docs.title: Top-level
docs.text:
usage: alpha-registry [-h] [--db DB]
                      {init,register,list,best,summary,backup,refresh-runs,search,lineage,export}
                      ...

positional arguments:
  {init,register,list,best,summary,backup,refresh-runs,search,lineage,export}

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --db DB

docs.title: init
docs.text:
usage: alpha-registry init [-h]

options:
  -h, --help  show this help message and exit

docs.title: register
docs.text:
usage: alpha-registry register [-h] --cfg CFG --metrics METRICS [--tags TAGS]

options:
  -h, --help         show this help message and exit
  --cfg CFG
  --metrics METRICS
  --tags TAGS

docs.title: list
docs.text:
usage: alpha-registry list [-h] [--limit LIMIT] [--tag TAG]

options:
  -h, --help     show this help message and exit
  --limit LIMIT
  --tag TAG

docs.title: best
docs.text:
usage: alpha-registry best [-h] --metric METRIC [--top TOP]

options:
  -h, --help       show this help message and exit
  --metric METRIC
  --top TOP

docs.title: summary
docs.text:
usage: alpha-registry summary [-h] --metric METRIC

options:
  -h, --help       show this help message and exit
  --metric METRIC

docs.title: backup
docs.text:
usage: alpha-registry backup [-h] [--retention RETENTION] [--dir DIR]

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --retention RETENTION
  --dir DIR

docs.title: refresh-runs
docs.text:
usage: alpha-registry refresh-runs [-h]

options:
  -h, --help  show this help message and exit

docs.title: search
docs.text:
usage: alpha-registry search [-h] --metric METRIC [--min MIN] [--max MAX]
                             [--tag TAG] [--limit LIMIT]

options:
  -h, --help       show this help message and exit
  --metric METRIC
  --min MIN
  --max MAX
  --tag TAG
  --limit LIMIT

docs.title: lineage
docs.text:
usage: alpha-registry lineage [-h] --alpha ALPHA

options:
  -h, --help     show this help message and exit
  --alpha ALPHA

docs.title: export
docs.text:
usage: alpha-registry export [-h] --what {best,summary} --metric METRIC
                             [--top TOP] [--format {csv,html}]
                             [--theme {light,dark}] --out OUT

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --what {best,summary}
  --metric METRIC
  --top TOP
  --format {csv,html}
  --theme {light,dark}
  --out OUT

docs.title: Identity (once per machine or per repo)
docs.text: git config --global user.name "Your Name" git config --global user.email "you@example.com"

docs.title: New / Clone
docs.text: git init git clone https://github.com//.git

docs.title: Status & history
docs.text: git status git log --oneline --graph --decorate -n 20

docs.title: Stage & commit
docs.text: git add git add -p git commit -m "message"

docs.title: Diff & restore
docs.text: git diff git diff --staged git restore git restore --staged

docs.title: Branches
docs.text: git branch git switch -c feature/x git switch main git merge feature/x git rebase main

docs.title: Stash
docs.text: git stash push -m "msg" git stash list git stash pop

docs.title: Remote workflow
docs.text: git remote -v git fetch origin git pull --ff-only git push -u origin main git push origin --tags

docs.title: Tags
docs.text: git tag -a v1.0.0 -m "msg" git push origin v1.0.0

docs.title: Undo (pick carefully)
docs.text: git reset --soft HEAD~1 git reset --mixed HEAD~1 git reset --hard HEAD~1 git revert

docs.title: Git LFS
docs.text: git lfs install git lfs track "*.pdf" git add .gitattributes git commit -m "Enable LFS for PDFs"

docs.title: .gitattributes
docs.text: • text=auto eol=lf

docs.title: Useful config
docs.text: git config --global pull.ff only git config --global init.defaultBranch main git config --global core.autocrlf false

docs.title: GitHub CLI (optional)
docs.text: gh auth login gh pr create --base main --head feature/x -t "Feature X" -b "Details" gh pr merge --squash --delete-branch

docs.title: Next thing
docs.text: Placeholder for next work

docs.title: Structure Features
docs.text:
• pivot: from ZigZag (% threshold)
  • swing: segment-by-segment move since prior pivot
  • overbalanced: last swing > rolling max of prior N swings
  • vol_state: simple BBW percentile bands → {low, neutral, high}

docs.title: Wip feat xyz
docs.text: WIP placeholder for feat/xyz at 10/11/2025 16:37:56
